title_en: Efficiently Approximating the Minimum-Volume Bounding Box of a Point Set in Three Dimensions
title_zh: 三维点集最小体积包围盒的高效近似算法
summary_en: $\renewcommand{\Re}{\mathbb{R}}$We present an efficient $O (n + 1/\varepsilon^{4.5})$-time algorithm for computing a $(1+\varepsilon$)-approximation of the minimum-volume bounding box of $n$ points in $\Re^3$. We also present a simpler algorithm (for the same purpose) whose running time is $O (n \log{n} + n / \varepsilon^3)$. We give some experimental results with implementations of various variants of the second algorithm. The implementation of the algorithm described in this paper is available online https://github.com/sarielhp/MVBB.
summary_zh: $\renewcommand{\Re}{\mathbb{R}}$本文提出一种高效的时间复杂度为 $O (n + 1/\varepsilon^{4.5})$ 的算法，用于计算 $\Re^3$ 空间中 $n$ 个点的最小体积包围盒的 $(1+\varepsilon)$ 近似解。同时，我们提出了一种更简洁的算法（用于相同目的），其时间复杂度为 $O (n \log{n} + n / \varepsilon^3)$。我们通过实现第二种算法的多种变体并进行了实验验证。本文所述算法的实现已公开于 https://github.com/sarielhp/MVBB。
